channel.title: GitHub Emacs Lisp Weekly Trending
channel.description: Weekly Trending of Emacs Lisp in GitHub

item.title: hlissner/doom-emacs
item.description: An Emacs framework for the stubborn martian hacker

item.title: syl20bnr/spacemacs
item.description: A community-driven Emacs distribution - The best editor is neither Emacs nor Vim, it's Emacs *and* Vim!

item.title: abo-abo/swiper
item.description: Ivy - a generic completion frontend for Emacs, Swiper - isearch with an overview, and more. Oh, man!

item.title: emacs-lsp/lsp-mode
item.description: Emacs client/library for the Language Server Protocol

item.title: bbatsov/prelude
item.description: Prelude is an enhanced Emacs 25.1+ distribution that should make your experience with Emacs both more pleasant and more powerful.

item.title: hlissner/emacs-doom-themes
item.description: An opinionated pack of modern color-themes

item.title: leahneukirchen/nb
item.description: Nota Bene, a quick note-taking tool for Emacs
